document_data.mainbody:
The Hazur Mountains were a small mountain range found on the Chultan Peninsula of southwest Faer√ªn that served as the border between Tashalar and Thindol.
The Hazur Mountains bordered the Shining Sea in the north and curved south for approximately  before reaching the coast of the Great Sea. The Dolsel Gap and River Dolsel split the mountain range in its southern tip.
